Radial bond-orientational descriptor

Note

See first 5_bo.

Reference [1].

RadialBondOrientationalDescriptor.__init__(trajectory, lmin=1, lmax=8, orders=None, bounds=(1, 2.5), dr=0.1, distance_grid=None, delta=0.1, skin=2.5, exponent=2, accept_nans=True, verbose=False)

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

References

1

Emanuele Boattini, Frank Smallenburg, and Laura Filion. Averaging local structure to predict the dynamic propensity in supercooled liquids. Phys. Rev. Letters, 127(8):088007, 2021. URL: https://link.aps.org/doi/10.1103/PhysRevLett.127.088007 (visited on 2022-02-09), doi:10.1103/PhysRevLett.127.088007.
